introduction: Hello, I'm from Communicus, a consumer opinion firm. We are conducting a survey and would like to include you. FEMALEs ONLY

card_a.prompt: Please look at this card and tell me which of the following phrases apply to you.

options.a: I eat dinner out at a restaurant at least twice a month.
options.b: I have a valid drivers license.
options.c: I subscribe to a daily newspaper.
options.d: I smoke one or more cigarettes per day.
options.e: I frequently have a glass of wine with dinner.

card_b.prompt: Into which of the following age groups do you fall? READ LIST
